title: WTB the last 4 cards for my T206 Cardinal set and all T205 Cardinals
author: cwazzy

posts.post_title: WTB the last 4 cards for my T206 Cardinal set and all T205 Cardinals
posts.post_content:
I'm down to the last few cards for my T206 St. Louis Nat'l set and am hoping that you fine folks can help me mark these off of my list.  I need SGC or PSA graded copies in the 3-4.5 range (I will settle for a nice 2 for the Willis).  It would also be nice to get some of these with less common backs.  I still need Tolstoi, Polar Bear, etc.  Please let me know if you have nicely centered copies of these players:

*Charles
*Rhodes
*Shaw
*Willis Throwing

I'm also hoping someone can help me out with a realistic looking reprint of the O'Hara St. Louis version.  I will probably never be able to afford the real thing but I want a "complete" set.  So if someone has something like this available I would very much appreciate it.

I also need all T205 Cardinals (except Huggins) in the PSA/SGC 3-4.5 range.  Please let me know what you have available.  

Thanks!

Chris

Hi Chris,
I'm catching up on some old posts on the Net54 BST forum, and came across your T206 want list.  I do have a duplicate of the Willis throwing, a nice PSA 4 with a Sweet Caporal back (sorry, no exotic backs), that I could sell for $145.  E-mail sent as well.
Thanks,
--S
